pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Overview## Description`whist_score` is a CLI tool that focusses on scorekeeping for the 4-man card game color whist.This Python package which can be installed via the command `pip install whist_score`.The program can be started by executing `whist-score` in a terminal after installation.# Features- [x] Scorekeeping- [x] Saving/loading games- [x] Modifying a game record- [x] Removing the last game record- [ ] Modifying the scoring rules- [ ] Moving to a full CLI tool with separate commands- [ ] Translations
